title: Bloody Mess
summary: A Unity game made for University of Advancing Technology's summer game jam where stay alive by collecting puddles of blood before mops clean you up.
long_summary: A Unity game made for University of Advancing Technology's summer game jam where stay alive by collecting puddles of blood before mops clean you up. Honestly, it's a bit of an embarrassment, but it was my first time using the 3D part of Unity!

gallery.caption: Go around and collect the little blood puddles
